titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Gideon Colquhoun, Assistant in Charge of the Residency at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: The letter details, for the information of the Resident at Bussora [Basra], the circumstances surrounding the flight of the Country Ship Rhiamshaw[ Rhaim Shaw] from the Bushire Roads under the command of Captain Heathorn. It also explains the importance behind returning the vessel to Bushire. It further informs him that William Bruce has received intelligence placing the ship in question off the Bussora Bar, and that he has dispatched the HC Cruizer Ternateto retrieve her.
